sql.if:
and ( e.emp_no = ${keyword1} or e.emp_name like '%${keyword1}%' or
e.jumin_num like '%${keyword1}%' or
d.dep_name like '%${keyword1}%' )

and
e.jikup = '사장'
e.jikup = '부장'
e.jikup = '과장'
e.jikup = '대리'
e.jikup = '주임'
e.jikup = '사원'

mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum "RNUM2", e.emp_no||'' "EMP_NO", e.emp_name "EMP_NAME", e.jikup "JIKUP", to_char(e.hire_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') "HIRE_DATE", d.dep_name "DEP_NAME" from (select * from employee order by emp_no) e, dept d where e.dep_no = d.dep_no and rownum <= ${selectPageNo*rowCntPerPage}
) re where re.RNUM2 >= ${(selectPageNo*rowCntPerPage)-rowCntPerPage+1}
select count(*) "CNT" from employee e, dept d where e.dep_no = d.dep_no
select emp_no||'' "EMP_NO", emp_name "EMP_NAME", jikup "JIKUP", to_char(hire_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') "HIRE_DATE" from employee

select e.EMP_NO||'' "EMP_NO", e.EMP_NAME "EMP_NAME", d.DEP_NAME "DEP_NAME", e.JIKUP "JIKUP", e.SALARY||'' "SALARY", to_char(e.HIRE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') "HIRE_DATE", e.JUMIN_NUM "JUMIN_NUM", e.PHONE_NUM "PHONE_NUM", (select emp_name from employee where emp_no = e.MGR_EMP_NO) "MGR_EMP_NAME" from employee e, dept d where e.DEP_NO = d.DEP_NO and EMP_NO = ${id}
